channel.title: TESS on Michael Mommert
channel.description: Recent content in TESS on Michael Mommert

item.title: A plethora of asteroids in TESS data
item.description: TESS is a satellite that observes bright stars to find brightness modulations revealing exoplanet transits - but it also observes a lot of asteroids over a long period of time, which makes it a unique asset for deriving long asteroid rotation periods.
